title: Old Wounds
description: Newly promoted Captain, Ed, is taken back when his ex-wife is assigned as his First Officer.

title: Command Performance
description: Alara must take command of the Orville when Ed and Kelly end up imprisoned in a replica of their old home.

title: About a Girl
description: Bortus and Klyden debate whether their newborn child should have a controversial surgery.

title: If the Stars Should Appear
description: The crew encounters a vessel adrift in space that's about to collide with a star.

title: Pria
description: Ed becomes smitten with the captain of a stranded ship, but Kelly suspects all is not what it seems.

title: Krill
description: Ed and Gordon are sent on an undercover mission to infiltrate a Krill ship and obtain a copy of their bible.

title: Majority Rule
description: Kelly leads a team to find two missing Union anthropologists on a planet similar to Earth.

title: Into the Fold
description: The crew set out to save Dr. Finn, her two sons and Isaac, after their shuttle gets thrown into uncharted space.

title: Cupid's Dagger
description: While the crew attempts to mediate a peace treaty between two warring cultures, tensions rise between Ed and Kelly when a familiar face comes aboard.

title: Firestorm
description: Alara questions whether she's fit for her job when a fire breaks out on the Orville and a crew member dies.

title: New Dimensions
description: The Orville gets damaged by a spatial anomaly causing harrowing effects to all living things.

title: Mad Idolatry
description: The crew crash land on a planet from another universe; Ed and Kelly consider getting back together.
